name: twee
author: Dmitri Mesin <dmitri.mesin@gmail.com>
description: Twee Framework designed to avoid editing code when you write and setting up your Express.js application. Most of things you will need to do - is to edit configuration in .json files. No code editing required. Modular structire allows you to organize your modules, such as, blog, forum etc. And organize them, turn them on/off
